universum.studios.android.ui.graphics.drawable

Class TintDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • universum.studios.android.ui.graphics.drawable.DrawableWrapper
        • universum.studios.android.ui.graphics.drawable.TintDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TintLayerDrawable

    public class TintDrawable
extends DrawableWrapper
    A DrawableWrapper implementation used to support tinting of a Drawable for the pre LOLLIPOP Android versions.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.graphics.drawable.Drawable

        Drawable.Callback, Drawable.ConstantState

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PorterDuff.Mode DEFAULT_TINT_MODE
      Default blending mode used to apply tint to a Drawable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TintDrawable(Drawable drawable)
      Creates a new instance of TintDrawable to wrap the given drawable to which will be applied tint set to this drawable via setTint(int) or setTintList(ColorStateList).
      TintDrawable(Drawable drawable, boolean cacheTintColor)
      Creates a new instance of TintDrawable to wrap the given drawable to which will be applied tint set to this drawable via setTint(int) or setTintList(ColorStateList).

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_TINT_MODE

        public static final PorterDuff.Mode DEFAULT_TINT_MODE
        Default blending mode used to apply tint to a Drawable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TintDrawable

        public TintDrawable(@NonNull
                    Drawable drawable)
        Creates a new instance of TintDrawable to wrap the given drawable to which will be applied tint set to this drawable via setTint(int) or setTintList(ColorStateList).
        Parameters:
        drawable - Drawable to wrap and apply tint to.
        See Also:
        setTintMode(PorterDuff.Mode)

      • TintDrawable

        public TintDrawable(@NonNull
                    Drawable drawable,
                    boolean cacheTintColor)
        Creates a new instance of TintDrawable to wrap the given drawable to which will be applied tint set to this drawable via setTint(int) or setTintList(ColorStateList).
        Parameters:
        drawable - Drawable to wrap and apply tint to.
        cacheTintColor - True if current tint color should be always saved (for performance), false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • createTintFilter

        @Nullable
public static PorterDuffColorFilter createTintFilter(@NonNull
                                                                Drawable drawable,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                ColorStateList tint,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                PorterDuff.Mode tintMode)
        Crates a new instance of PorterDuffColorFilter with color obtained from the specified tint colors for the current state of the specified drawable.
        Parameters:
        drawable - The drawable used to resolve proper tint color based on its current state.
        tint - Set of available tint colors.
        tintMode - Blending mode for the new color filter.
        Returns:
        New PorterDuffColorFilter with the resolved color and the specified tintMode.
